alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:46PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson County through 115 PM CDT... At 1245 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brookside, or near Fultondale. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Birmingham, Gardendale, Fultondale, Tarrant, Adamsville, Graysville, Brookside, Cardiff, Ketona Lakes, Kingston, Birmingham Airport, Forestdale, Minor, Watson, New Castle, Danville, Docena and Sayre. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
